item.title: #001 - Getting Started (Part 1)
item.description: Getting Started - Part 1 Welcome to Day 1 of #30DaysOfPlaywright!! Today’s goal is to make progress on the Getting Started tutorial which should get us set up with the Playwright Test runner in our local development environment - and get us configured to do our first test run. There’s a lot covered in there, so I’ve decided to break this into multiple parts. Part 1: - Install the Playwright Test runner and validate setup by completing your first test run with the sample test script.

item.title: Hello, #30DaysOfPlaywright
item.description: Let’s Learn About Testing! It’s December 1! The new year is just over 30 days away so it’s the perfect time to make a learning resolution, get started on it now - and then check it off the very first day of the New Year! So what do you want to learn this year? I’ve decided to invest this month exploring a topic that fascinates me - end-to-end testing for modern web apps.

item.title: About This Project
